form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Classify Status of Alien Relative for Issuance of Immigrant Visa, Form I-130

full_text: UNITED Immigration and Naturalization Service MAR 2 1 1985 Form Approved OMB NO 46-RO 401 PENTION TO Fee Stamp PLEASE NOTE CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR NOV 3 0 1984 3500 YOU ARE THE PETITIONER AND YOUR RELATIVE ISSUANCE OF IS THE IMMIGRANT VISA BENEFICIARY vitaldas SAA - 840140 1. Name of beneficiary (Last. in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. Do Not Write in This Space 3. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of 3 MAPARA -CHIMANLAL- V beneficiary's children: ARUNC. MAPARA 9-26-35 4. Other names used: (including maiden name if married) INDI? NONE JAYAMATI PSHAH 10-24-36 5. Country of beneficiary's birth 6. My phone number is: MAPARA-MANOJ-CHIMANLAL (714)998-3186 FOIA (b)(6) 9. Other names used: (including maiden name if married woman) 10. Relationship of beneficiary to myself NONE FATHER 11. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) in: (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) SEPT. 16, 1944 (ADOD,CDISTISURAT) GUJARAT, INDIA 12. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate, and date and place of naturalization: MANOJ-CHIMANLAL-MAPARA, No. 10677252, JAN 1978, LOS (2) If known, my former alien registration was A 17 784 061 ANGELES (3) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name nats Lonnal Ceit sven and returned. (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: Cortified true and/correct (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with instruction 3 a (2) D. Denfold 11-3084 13. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: NOT ApoRtact sets sentative, USINS a. Alien Registration Number: b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A- 14. Beneficiary's marital status: 15. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is Married Widowed Divorced Single for your spouse) MAPARA-LILAVATI-C. 18 APRIL, 195I NDIA 16. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) c/o DR. A.C. MAPARA, FEEDER ROAD BILIMORA, W.RLY., GUJARAT STATE INDIA 17. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: NOT APPLICABLE a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Names of my prior spouses C. Names of spouse's prior spouses 18. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? YES NO 19. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? YES NO (CONTINUE WITH ITEM 20 ON REVERSE)- OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF PETITIONER I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct.
